module.name: Parking Lot
module.description: Manages parking lot extensions and other options. Parking is a way of putting calls "on hold", and then picking them up from any extension.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.5* Fixes park retrieve issue and needsreload #6375 *2.11.0.4* #6374 sql error updating *2.11.0.3* fix some localization *2.11.0.2* Cleanup of wording *2.11.0.1* Completely rewritten from the ground up. Fixes #5498, #5549 *2.10.0.2* #5901 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.4* #4965, #4972 *2.9.0.3* #4914 *2.9.0.2* #4224 *2.9.0.1* #4740 *2.9.0.0* #4655
